isis.stitle: BATTERY - BATTERY TESTING - BATTERY CAPACITY (LOAD) TEST

svcprocinfo.para: To perform battery capacity (load) test, follow instructions supplied with the test equipment.

svcsubproc.title: Filler Cap and Semi-Maintenance Free
svcsubproc.para: A satisfactory capacity (load) test can be made only when battery electrolyte equals or exceeds 1.225 specific gravity, corrected to 26.7°C (80°F).

svcsubproc.title: Maintenance Free
svcsubproc.para: A satisfactory load test can only be performed when the test indicator green dot is visible and the battery has a stabilized open circuit voltage of 12.4 volts or more.

important.para: Always follow manufacturer's instructions and precautions when using battery load testing equipment.
